r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added
- Preview CodeIgniter v2 integration #588 - Preview WordPress v4 integration #570
Please report any issues you encounter with these two preview integrations.
### Fixed
- ZF1 integration response after loading #609 - Prevent `mysqli_connect()` span from closing twice #610 - Support mysqli usage when using real_connect approach #607
